title: Could go replace python????
body:
by **iamybj**: 
Python is good, but the syntax is not comfortable for the c/c++ users.
And python is very powerful, almost can do everything ,esp in network 
programming field...
Also python is cross-platform programming language, was widely used in both 
windows and unix platform.
Right now, I want to learn python or go. But I want to lean only one of them. 
Which one should I choose??
